entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
